data.description: Interface to RIPE NCC's Syncupdates facility
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module was designed to enable users to connect and send Whois
    objects directly to the RIPE NCC Syncupdates server for updating.

    For more details, please visit:

    http://www.ripe.net/ripencc/pub-services/db/syncupdates/index.html
